content: Embed code successfully copied to clipboard

comment.text: The translation key "EmbedCodeSuccessfullyCopied" is used to display a success message when the user copies embed code. It appears in a modal dialog as a toast notification when the user clicks the "Copy" button, indicating that the code has been successfully copied to their clipboard.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Yerləşdirmə kodu uğurla mübadilə buferinə nüsxələndi' is a literal translation and doesn't sound natural in Azerbaijani.  'Mübadilə buferinə' is a technical term that's not commonly used for 'clipboard'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Daha yaxşı çeviri: 'Yerləşdirmə kodu uğurla keçid xəttinə (clipboard) kopyalandı' or 'Yerləşdirmə kodu klipanboyda (clipboard) müvəffəqiyyətlə kopyalandı'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation '挿入するコードを取得する' does not accurately convey the meaning of 'Embed code successfully copied to clipboard'. It literally translates to 'Get code to insert'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like '埋め込みコードがクリップボードにコピーされました' (Ikimomi kōdo ga kuripubōdo ni kopī saremashita) which means 'The embed code was copied to the clipboard'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation "Obține codul pentru inserare" does not accurately convey the meaning of "Embed code successfully copied to clipboard." It translates to "Get the embed code." It doesn't mention the copying action or confirmation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Codul de inserare a fost copiat cu succes în clipboard.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'කාවද්දන කේතය පසුරුපුවරුවට පිටපත් විය' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Embed code successfully copied to clipboard.' 'කාවද්දන' (kawaddan) implies 'protected' or 'held,' which is not relevant to the context of an embed code.  'පසුරුපුවරුවට' (pasurupuwaruwata) is an awkward and overly formal way to say 'clipboard'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A better translation would be something like 'ඇන්බෙඩ් කේතය පිටපත් කළා' (Anbed keta pitakatha kala) or 'ඇන්බෙඩ් කේතය ක්ලිප්බෝඩ් වෙත පිටපත් විය' (Anbed keta klippobd hewa pitakatha viya).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly wrong, the phrase 'පිටපත් විය' (pitakatha viya) sounds somewhat passive. A more active construction improves the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Use 'පිටපත් කළා' (pitakatha kala) instead of 'පිටපත් විය' (pitakatha viya).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'odložišče' is a general term for 'storage' or 'repository', while 'clipboard' is more specific.  While understandable, it's not the most precise translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Koda za vdelavo je bila uspešno kopirana v zgodovino (ali: izhodišče)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Уграђени код успешно копиран на привремену меморију' is a literal translation but not the most natural way to express 'Embed code successfully copied to clipboard' in Serbian. 'Привремену меморију' refers to temporary memory/clipboard, which isn't always explicitly stated.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Уграђени код успешно скопиран у међускладност (or simply: Уграђени код успешно скопиран).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'Уграђени код успешно скопиран' would read better with a single space between 'код' and 'успешно'.

The translation 'Ugrađeni kod uspešno kopiran na privremenu memoriju' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the natural flow of the English phrase. 'Privremena memorija' refers to temporary memory which is generally understood as clipboard, but it's not the most common or idiomatic way to express it in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ugrađeni kod uspešno kopiran u isečnu tablu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses lowercase for the first word of the sentence 'ugrađeni'. While not strictly incorrect, it's generally preferred to capitalize the first word of a sentence in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ugrađeni kod uspešno kopiran u isečnu tablu

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'буфера' (buffer) is a bit clunky in this context. It's technically correct, but not the most natural-sounding.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Код вбудовування успішно скопійовано в буфер обміну

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Consider adding a period at the end of the sentence for clarity and completeness.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Код вбудовування успішно скопійовано в буфер обміну.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'bộ nhớ tạm' is not the most accurate translation of 'clipboard'. While technically correct, 'clipboard' is often used directly in Vietnamese in technical contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã sao chép mã nhúng thành công vào clipboard

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "获取要插入的代码" does not accurately reflect the meaning of "Embed code successfully copied to clipboard". It translates to "Get the code to insert", which is not the same as confirming a successful copy action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like "嵌入代码已成功复制到剪贴板" (Rù cài mǎ yǐ chénggōng fùzào dào jiǎntiēbǎn) which directly translates to 'Embed code successfully copied to clipboard'.
